name: Sweet Bakery Cake Shop Cashier
description:
Prepare yourself for Sweet Bakery Cake Shop Cashier where you will have excellent opportunity to enter in bakery shop or realistic new year cake shop from a cooking game on realistic cash register with a lot of family fun. This Sweet Bakery Cake Shop Cashier allows you to take on the role of cake bakery cashier girl from cashier games, and serve various customers to become bakery shop cash manager.


Sweet Bakery Cake Shop Cashier engages you in beautifully designed bakery shop where you will handle various happy family customer and sell them numerous Christmas cake or tasty ice cream cakes utilizing highly advanced cash register with a lot of fun.

Features:

- Beautifully designed HD graphics in a realistic bakery environment.
- High-quality sounds & effects from cake bakery games.
- Very engaging realistic shopping simulation with a lot of family fun.
- Highly engaging kids game based play mode.
- Multiple payment collection methods like cash, credit card or NFC & more.
